title: Bug 34951NPE compiling without aspectjrt.jar
description: Compiling spacewar without specifying aspectjrt.jar on the classpath causes aNPE.Expected an error message "aspectjrt.jar required".Steps to reproduce1) install latest2) cd doc/examples3) java jar ../../lib/aspectjtools.jar verbose @spacewar/debug.lstRESULT:NPE in attached log
